itunes:title: S1, E11: Are My Kids on Track: Spiritual Milestone Identity
title: S1, E11: Are My Kids on Track: Spiritual Milestone Identity
itunes:author: That Sounds Fun Network
itunes:subtitle: In this episode we talk about the elementary years as they build their identity, what that identity is, how to remove shame from our language and how to help our kids discover their identity. This episode is a companion to chapter 10 of the Are...
itunes:summary:
In this episode we talk about the elementary years as they build their identity, what that identity is, how to remove shame from our language and how to help our kids discover their identity. This episode is a companion to chapter 10 of the Are My Kids on Track book. Be sure to download the free supplemental small group questions here.
 
Connect with Sissy, David and Melissa @raisingboysandgirls
Connect with Sarah @sarahwbragg or her podcast here
description:
In this episode we talk about the elementary years as they build their identity, what that identity is, how to remove shame from our language and how to help our kids discover their identity. This episode is a companion to chapter 10 of the Are My Kids on Track book. Be sure to download the free supplemental small group questions here.

 

Connect with Sissy, David and Melissa @raisingboysandgirls

Connect with Sarah @sarahwbragg or her podcast here
content:encoded:
In this episode we talk about the elementary years as they build their identity, what that identity is, how to remove shame from our language and how to help our kids discover their identity. This episode is a companion to chapter 10 of the Are My Kids on Track book. Be sure to download the free supplemental small group questions here.
